channel.title: Web Whisky Weekend
channel.description: Recent content on Web Whisky Weekend

item.title: The Whisky
item.description: The Whisky A tremendous selection of fine bourbons, scotches, and other whisky, not to mention some great wine and everything you need to make delicious cocktails. You're guaranteed to find something tasty. Everyone is required to bring at least one bottle of something they enjoy so the selection is always interesting. Most people bring more, and there's a good assortment provided. We even made an app to keep track of it all.

item.title: The Food
item.description: The Food Your Web Whisky Weekend ticket includes all the food and drink for the entire weekend (unless we decide to go out for a meal, but who would do that?). All food is prepared fresh on site by people who really know how to cook. Previous year's menus have included: Breakfast Fresh scrambled migas with bell pepper, jalape√±o, onion, and chorizo Breakfast omelettes with spinach, sausage or bacon, with white cheddar cheese grits Steel-cut oatmeal Fresh fruit Lunch/Dinner

item.title: The People
item.description: The People Great people have great conversations. The people at Web Whisky Weekend are both leaders in their fields and really fun to talk to. Attendees Include Jina 5 year alumni Design Systems Expert. Organizer of Clarity. Previously: Amazon, Salesforce, Apple, Github. Jonathan Snook 5 year alumni Designer, Developer, Speaker, Author, and Creator of SMACSS. Previously: Xero, Shopify, Yahoo, Squarespace.

item.title: The House
item.description: The House Over 12,000 sq.ft. of luxury including a pool, hot tub, separate pool house, large fire pit, full size volleyball court, tether ball, corn hole boards, croquet, small basketball court, some frisbee golf targets (bring your own discs) and a 16 seat home theater. The Ark on Lake Lanier Accommodates 45 People with 14 sleeping areas, including 8 king, 3 queen, 1 full and 15 twin beds, the Ark has room for 10 different families.

item.title: Register Now
item.description: Registration Opens Feb 15, 2020 Important Pricing Info: All private bedrooms and full-size beds in shared rooms include attendance for two people. You can book them for yourself or bring a +1, up to you. Kathy's Cabin includes the entire cabin (which can technically sleep 3 people). Lots of rooms to choose from. Download the Bedroom Guide
